data.title: Metcash Appoints New Director Marina Go
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Metcash Limited ( (AU:MTS) ) has provided an update.

Metcash Limited announced the appointment of Marina Simone Go as a new director effective from February 1, 2025. While Go holds no personal securities, she is a beneficiary of 17,000 ordinary shares in Metcash, held by Citicorp Nominees Pty Ltd on behalf of the Cbus Super Fund. This appointment marks a strategic addition to Metcash’s board, potentially influencing the company’s governance and strategic direction.

More about Metcash Limited

Metcash Limited operates in the wholesale distribution industry, primarily providing grocery, fresh produce, and liquor products to independent retailers across Australia. The company focuses on supporting independent businesses in a competitive retail market.

data.title: TDG Gold Secures C$4 Million in First Tranche of Private Placement
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

TDG Gold ( (TSE:TDG) ) has shared an announcement.

TDG Gold Corp announced the closing of the first tranche of its non-brokered private placement, raising C$4,000,000 through the issuance of 8,000,000 non-flow-through shares. The company plans to use the funds for ongoing exploration efforts in British Columbia and general working capital. The completion of the final tranche is linked to the acquisition of the Sofia Property from Skeena Resources Limited and is pending regulatory approval. The transaction involves insider participation, with board approval obtained under MI 61-101 exemptions. This development aims to enhance TDG’s operational capabilities and strengthen its market position.

More about TDG Gold

TDG Gold Corp is a company in the mining industry, focusing on the exploration and development of mineral properties in British Columbia, with a particular emphasis on the Greater Shasta-Newberry project and Baker Complex.

YTD Price Performance: 338.46%

Average Trading Volume: 749,211

Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Sell

Current Market Cap: C$82.92M

The latest announcement is out from Aus Tin Mining Limited ( (AU:C7A) ).

Clara Resources Australia Limited has announced a General Meeting scheduled for March 11, 2025, in Brisbane, where shareholders will vote on key resolutions. The agenda includes the removal of Directors Nicholas Mather and Brian Gerry Moller, and the ratification of a previous share issue totaling 70 million shares to professional and sophisticated investors. Stakeholders are encouraged to participate through proxy voting, and outcomes could significantly impact the company’s leadership and equity distribution.

data.description:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Waypoint REIT Ltd. ( (AU:WPR) ) just unveiled an update.

Waypoint REIT Ltd has announced a change in the substantial holding of its voting shares. The KKR Entities, comprised of Comet Asia Holdings I and II, KKR Asia III Fund Investments, and KKR Asian Fund III L.P., increased their voting power from 4.85% to 6.01%. This change may impact the company’s control dynamics and indicate increased interest from the KKR Entities, potentially affecting stakeholders’ perceptions and the company’s strategic decisions.

More about Waypoint REIT Ltd.

data.title: Eumundi Group’s Acquisition by SEQ Hospitality Approved by Court
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Eumundi Group Limited ( (AU:EBG) ) has provided an announcement.

Eumundi Group Limited announced that the Federal Court of Australia has approved a scheme of arrangement, allowing SEQ Hospitality Group Pty Ltd to acquire 100% of Eumundi’s shares. As a result, Eumundi shares will be suspended from the ASX, with shareholders set to receive $1.62 per share. This development marks a significant change for Eumundi’s stakeholders, indicating a strategic shift in ownership and potentially impacting its future operations within the market.

More about Eumundi Group Limited

Topy Industries, Limited ( (JP:7231) ) has issued an announcement.

Topy Industries, Limited announced the completion of its treasury stock acquisition, purchasing 797,400 shares for 1,744 million yen. This move is part of a flexible capital policy responding to changes in the management environment, which may impact the company’s financial strategy and shareholder value.

data.title: Nickel Industries Revises Sampala Project Disclosures and Advances Exploration
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

The latest announcement is out from Nickel Mines Ltd. ( (AU:NIC) ).

Nickel Industries Limited has updated its disclosures related to the Sampala Project, retracting certain information that was not compliant with ASX regulations. The project features an exploration target of 350 to 700 million dry metric tonnes of nickel, enhancing the company’s self-sufficiency in nickel ore supply for its operations. The ongoing development and exploration efforts are likely to strengthen the company’s position in the nickel industry, potentially impacting its stakeholders positively.

More about Nickel Mines Ltd.

Nickel Industries Limited is a company in the mining industry, primarily focusing on the exploration and development of nickel and cobalt projects. The company is involved in the Sampala Project, consisting of advanced nickel-cobalt projects, and aims to support its downstream operations at the Indonesia Morowali Industrial Park.

data.title: Genetic Technologies Faces Potential Wind-Up Amidst Insolvency
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

An update from Genetic Technologies ( (AU:GTG) ) is now available.

Genetic Technologies Limited is undergoing a voluntary administration process. The administrators have called for a reconvened second meeting of creditors to decide the company’s future, with options including executing a DOCA, ending the administration, or winding up the company. As no DOCA proposal has been received and the company is insolvent, the administrators recommend winding up the company.

More about Genetic Technologies

data.title: Lexston Mining Corporation Launches Private Placement for Strategic Growth
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

An announcement from Lexston Life Sciences Corp. ( (TSE:LEXT) ) is now available.

Lexston Mining Corporation has announced a non-brokered private placement to raise up to $196,000 through the sale of 2,450,000 units priced at $0.08 each. The proceeds will be used for general working capital, with the issuance subject to Canadian Securities Exchange filing requirements and a four-month statutory hold period. This move could potentially strengthen Lexston’s financial position and support its ongoing mineral exploration projects, reinforcing its market presence.

More about Lexston Life Sciences Corp.

Lexston Mining Corporation is a Canadian mineral exploration company focused on acquiring and developing mineral projects in British Columbia and Nunavut, Canada, aiming to enhance value for all stakeholders. It trades on the OTCQB Venture Market, which caters to early-stage and developing companies in the U.S. and internationally, ensuring compliance with reporting and management certification processes.
